trans-unit.source: Do Not Use Unsafe Cipher Modes
trans-unit.target: 请勿使用不安全的密码模式

trans-unit.source: These modes are vulnerable to attacks. Use only approved modes (CBC, CTS).
trans-unit.target: 这些模式容易受到攻击。请只使用批准的模式（CBC，CTS）。

trans-unit.source: It uses an unsafe Cipher Mode {0}
trans-unit.target: 它使用不安全的密码模式 {0} .

trans-unit.source: A certificate can help authenticate the identity of the server. Clients should validate the server certificate to ensure requests are sent to the intended server. If the ServerCertificateValidationCallback always returns 'true', any certificate will pass validation.
trans-unit.target: A certificate can help authenticate the identity of the server. Clients should validate the server certificate to ensure requests are sent to the intended server. If the ServerCertificateValidationCallback always returns 'true', any certificate will pass validation.

trans-unit.source: The ServerCertificateValidationCallback is set to a function that accepts any server certificate, by always returning true. Ensure that server certificates are validated to verify the identity of the server receiving requests.
trans-unit.target: The ServerCertificateValidationCallback is set to a function that accepts any server certificate, by always returning true. Ensure that server certificates are validated to verify the identity of the server receiving requests.

trans-unit.source: Do Not Use Broken Cryptographic Algorithms
trans-unit.target: 不要使用损坏的加密算法

trans-unit.source: An attack making it computationally feasible to break this algorithm exists. This allows attackers to break the cryptographic guarantees it is designed to provide. Depending on the type and application of this cryptographic algorithm, this may allow attackers to read enciphered messages, tamper with enciphered messages, forge digital signatures, tamper with hashed content, or otherwise compromise any cryptosystem based on this algorithm. Replace encryption uses with the AES algorithm (AES-256, AES-192 and AES-128 are acceptable) with a key length greater than or equal to 128 bits. Replace hashing uses with a hashing function in the SHA-2 family, such as SHA512, SHA384, or SHA256. Replace digital signature uses with RSA with a key length greater than or equal to 2048-bits, or ECDSA with a key length greater than or equal to 256 bits.
trans-unit.target: 存在可能在计算方面破坏此算法的攻击。这使得攻击者可以破坏它本应提供的加密保证。根据此加密算法的类型和应用情况，可能会使攻击者读取加密消息、篡改加密消息、伪造数字签名、篡改哈希内容，或以其他方式危害任何基于该算法的加密系统。将加密用法替换为密钥长度大于或等于 128 位的 AES 算法(AES-256、AES-192 和 AES-128 均可)。将哈希用法替换为 SHA-2 系列中的哈希函数，例如 SHA512、SHA384 或 SHA256。将数字签名用法替换为密钥长度大于等于 2048 位的 RSA，或者密钥长度大于等于 256 位的 ECDSA。

trans-unit.source: Do not use insecure cryptographic algorithm MD5.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用不安全的加密算法 MD5。

trans-unit.source: This type implements MD5, a cryptographically insecure hashing function. Hash collisions are computationally feasible for the MD5 and HMACMD5 algorithms. Replace this usage with a SHA-2 family hash algorithm (SHA512, SHA384, SHA256).
trans-unit.target: 此类型实现 MD5，它是一种不安全的加密哈希函数。在计算方面，MD5 和 HMACMD5 算法可能出现哈希冲突。请将此使用项替换为 SHA-2 系列哈希算法(SHA512、SHA384、SHA256)。

trans-unit.source: Do not use insecure cryptographic algorithm SHA1.
trans-unit.target: 不要使用不安全的加密算法 SHA1。

trans-unit.source: This type implements SHA1, a cryptographically insecure hashing function. Hash collisions are computationally feasible for the SHA-1 and SHA-0 algorithms. Replace this usage with a SHA-2 family hash algorithm (SHA512, SHA384, SHA256).
trans-unit.target: 此类型实现 SHA1，它是一种不安全的加密哈希函数。在计算方面，SHA-1 和 SHA-0 算法可能出现哈希冲突。请将此使用项替换为 SHA-2 系列哈希算法(SHA512、SHA384、SHA256)。

trans-unit.source: Do Not Use Weak Cryptographic Algorithms

Cryptographic algorithms degrade over time as attacks become for advances to attacker get access to more computation. Depending on the type and application of this cryptographic algorithm, further degradation of the cryptographic strength of it may allow attackers to read enciphered messages, tamper with enciphered messages, forge digital signatures, tamper with hashed content, or otherwise compromise any cryptosystem based on this algorithm. Replace encryption uses with the AES algorithm (AES-256, AES-192 and AES-128 are acceptable) with a key length greater than or equal to 128 bits. Replace hashing uses with a hashing function in the SHA-2 family, such as SHA-2 512, SHA-2 384, or SHA-2 256.
trans-unit.target: 加密算法随时间的推移而变弱，因为攻击成为攻击者获取更多计算的推动因素。根据此加密算法的类型和应用情况，其加密强度逐渐降低可能会使攻击者读取加密消息、篡改加密消息、伪造数字签名、篡改哈希内容，或以其他方式危害任何基于该算法的加密系统。将加密用法替换为密钥长度大于或等于 128 位的 AES 算法(AES-256、AES-192 和 AES-128 均可)。将哈希用法替换为 SHA-2 系列中的哈希函数，例如 SHA-2 512、SHA-2 384 或 SHA-2 256。
